title: SPE Chapter 04 - Themes: Model/View/Theme Separation with Switchable Layouts
description:
Chapter 04 of Simple PHP Examples - separating data from presentation with three switchable layout themes.

This chapter continues the pattern: same visual output, deeper architecture. Models return data arrays, Views render HTML fragments, and a Theme class wraps everything in one of three layouts. The dropdown menu for theme selection uses pure CSS.

Key concepts covered:
‚Ä¢ Model/View/Theme three-layer separation
‚Ä¢ Models return semantic data arrays (no HTML)
‚Ä¢ Views render HTML fragments from model data
‚Ä¢ Theme class with nav(), dropdown(), and layout methods
‚Ä¢ Three layouts: Simple, TopNav, SideBar
‚Ä¢ CSS-driven dropdown menu (no JavaScript)
‚Ä¢ Dynamic theme method invocation
‚Ä¢ URL parameter ?t=ThemeName for layout selection
